SKT_FIRST.name: Voice of a Songbird
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. After attacking, if the enemy has no <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color>, increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>. If the enemy has a <color=#28d9ed>buff</color>, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。攻撃後、対象に<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>がない場合、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>UPさせる。対象に<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>がある場合、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除する。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다. 공격 후 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>가 없다면 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 증가시킵니다. <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 보유하고 있다면 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人。攻击后,若目标没有<color=#28d9ed>强化效果</color>,则使自身的<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>。若附带<color=#28d9ed>强化效果</color>,则有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的几率解除目标的<color=#28d9ed>1个</color><color=#28d9ed>强化效果</color>。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases Effectiveness for 3 turns before attacking.
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 攻撃前、効果命中UP +3ターン
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 攻击前,效果命中提升,持续3回合。

SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: すべてのスキルターン-2ターン
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 所有技能的冷却时间-2回合

SKT_SECOND.name: Bursting Patriotism
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Decreases <color=#28d9ed>Damage Taken</color> by allies (excluding self) by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> and further decreases <color=#28d9ed>Damage Taken</color> by Fire allies by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.\n\n(Triggered Effect) When an enemy uses a <color=#28d9ed>non-attack skill</color>, activates an <color=#28d9ed>Agile Response</color>. Reduces duration of buffs on all enemies by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>, increases <color=#28d9ed>Attack and Defense</color> of all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>, and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)自分を除く味方の<color=#28d9ed>受けるダメージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>減少させ、火属性の味方の<color=#28d9ed>受けるダメージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>追加で減少させる。\n\n(発動効果)敵が<color=#28d9ed>攻撃以外のスキル</color>を使用時、<color=#28d9ed>【迅速対応】</color>を発動する。敵全体の強化効果持続時間を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少させ、味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>と<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせた後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
(패시브 효과) 자신을 제외한 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>받는 피해</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>만큼 감소시키고 화속성 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>받는 피해</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>만큼 추가로 감소시킵니다.


(발동 효과) 적이 <color=#28d9ed>공격이 아닌 스킬</color> 사용 시 <color=#28d9ed>신속 대응</color> 효과가 발동합니다.
적 전체의 강화 효과 지속 시간을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소시키고
아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가시킨 뒤, 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>만큼 증가시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: (被动效果) 使除自身外的友军<color=#28d9ed>所受伤害</color>降低<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>,且使火属性友军的<color=#28d9ed>所受伤害</color>额外降低<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。\n\n(触发效果) 敌人使用<color=#28d9ed>非攻击类技能</color>时,触发<color=#28d9ed>迅速应对</color>效果。使全体敌人的强化效果持续时间减少<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>,并在使全体友军的<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>和<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>后,使自身的<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Perforator
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Before using skill, removes <color=#28d9ed>1</color> buff from all enemies and attacks all enemies. Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. Enemy cannot Counterattack, Revenge, or use Agile Response immediately after this skill.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: スキル使用前、敵全体の強化効果を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除して敵全体にダメージを与える。対象全体に<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>強化不可</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。このスキル直後には敵の反撃、復讐、迅速対応が発動しない。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr:
스킬 사용 전 적 전체의 강화 효과를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제하고
적 전체를 공격합니다.\n<color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 대상 모두에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>강화 불가</color>를 부여합니다.\n이 스킬 직후에는 적의 반격, 복수, 신속대응이 발동하지 않습니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 施展技能前,解除全体敌人的<color=#28d9ed>1个</color>强化效果并攻击全体敌人。有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的几率对所有目标造成<color=#28d9ed>无法强化</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。此技能施展后,不会触发敌人的反击、复仇及迅速应对。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Generates <color=#28d9ed>25</color> Chain Points after attacking.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、CPを<color=#28d9ed>25</color>回復する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除する。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>25</color>의 CP를 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh:
<color=#ffd732>连携收尾效果</color>:攻击后,使CP恢复<color=#28d9ed>25</color>。

<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率解除目标的
<color=#28d9ed>1个</color><color=#28d9ed>强化效果</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
